author: alexssd7fp
content: I see that Snap/Fast sync is not available post-merge, what are the plans on improving the sync speed? Full sync consumes a lot of time.

author: mariusvanderwijden
content: Snap sync is available post-merge at least on geth with a CL that allows for optimistic sync to the head

author: alexssd7fp
content: I'm syncing up on Kiln using Geth's snap, and I see that it fell back to full sync when the TTD was reached

author: alexssd7fp
content: Ah, I see that there is some kind of fast sync going on now

author: alexssd7fp
content: Sorry I was wrong, the warn log that sounded like "discarding legacy sync mode" confused me.

author: alexssd7fp
content: Post-merge consensus is much more complex ðŸ˜…
